thread.title: Silly upper East Side parents worried to send their kids to school with Trump grandkid
thread.title_full: Silly upper East Side parents worried to send their kids to school with Trump grandkid

author: Bristol Palin
title: Silly upper East Side parents worried to send their kids to school with Trump grandkid
text:
Embed from Getty Images 

Calls to treat the children of politicians with civility always cause me to crack up. I’ve seen how the press fawned over Chelsea Clinton and then later Malia and Sasha Obama, but couldn’t wait to criticize me and my siblings when my mom hit the national political stage. 
Well, looks like the “peace and tolerance” liberals are back at their loving ways. Moms on the Upper East Side are freaking out at the prospect of sending their bundles of joy to preschool with President Trump’s grandson. Yes, really. Like their pre-schoolers will come home believing in supply side economics. 
Page Six reports on what’s going on UrbanBaby.com – a place I never want to go, by the way. 
One of the anonymous contributors to UrbanBaby.com said her son had gotten into Buckley [School], but she didn’t want to send him there because a son of Donald Trump Jr . ’s (likely 4-year-old Spencer Frederick) is said to be going to kindergarten there in the fall. 
“They will be in the same classroom and I don’t think I can deal with this. Birthday parties, etc.,” the mother wrote. Another mom replied: “It’s an innocent kid. It’s not like he can help the family he was born into. The hate must run really deep with you.” 
A third mother wrote: “You almost have to decline. It sounds like it will drive you crazy . . . You want to spend nine years worried that DS [darling son] is getting infected with Trumpism?” 
Is this what AMERICA HAS COME TO?? 
– it’s going to be a long 8 years for you.
